Glory&Peace
- ì¥ê·¼í¬ ì‚¬,ê³¡

Glory fills the sky,
Peace  on earth tonight,
Love has come to stay.

Heaven softly sings,
Grace on gentle wings,
Light will guide our way.

Endless love flows 
above us all,
Tenderly touching my soul.

Joy will fill 
each lonely soul,
Hearts made whole in hope and peace.

Merry Christmas 
on every street,
Glory and peace fill this day
